attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PETROL / DIESEL ARE A NECCESSARY FUEL ITEM TO PURCHASE FOR TRAVEL/RUNNING A BUSINESS ETC;
WHY SHOULD WE PAY TWO TAXES ( fuel duty approx 60p & 17.5%vat )ON AN ESSENTIAL FUEL WHEN WE ONLY PAY 5% VAT FOR GAS / ELECTRICITY.

rejection.details: Sorry, we did ask for you to remove the block capitals so we'll have to reject this one for a second time
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
